description:
Hikaru has returned after reviving Rayearth`s sword, but doesn`t remember confessing her love to Lantis! Hikaru later bumps into him in the castle garden en route to see Clef. Meanwhile, aboard the bridge of Autozam`s battleship NSX, Eagle commands for the launch of the Laguna Cannon to see how Cephiro will react. The attack on Cephiro castle has finally begun!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Eagle ! L`attaque du château de Cefiro
Eagle`s All-out Attack on Cephiro Castle
イーグル・セフィーロ城総攻撃!
